layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutSVGResourceLinearGradient {linearGradient} [id="Gradient"] [gradientUnits=userSpaceOnUse] [start=(0,0)] [end=(800,0)]
      LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=0.00] [color=#FF0000]
      LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=1.00] [color=#FF0000]
    LayoutSVGRect {rect} at (0,0) size 800x600 [fill={[type=SOLID] [color=#008000]}] [x=0.00] [y=0.00] [width=800.00] [height=600.00]
    LayoutSVGText {text} at (0,0) size 0x0
    LayoutSVGText {text} at (0,0) size 0x0
